Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute at Devon/California
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie and Devon, due to street blockage near Devon/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie and Devon, due to street blockage near Devon/California.

Allow extra travel time.
